question: よかった
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>good</kanji>? It's also <vocabulary>good</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
Since this word is made up of a single kanji, it probably uses the kun'yomi reading. You did not learn this reading, so here's a mnemonic to help you to remember: 

A <vocabulary>good</vocabulary> way to pass the time is with a <reading>yo</reading>-yo (<ja>よ</ja>). But it better be a good yo-yo. A bad one will just fall apart.
